data.title: Best Movies Like The War Zone
meta_keywords: movies similar to The War Zone
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to The War Zone: Oldboy (2003), Ken Park (2002), Dogtooth (2009), The Girl Next Door (2007), Alpine Fire (1985), Mysterious Skin (2004), Touchless (2013), Bastard Out of Carolina (1996), Hard Candy (2005), Trust (2010)
